SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into address (city, detail, district, phone, province, receiver, user_id) values (#{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update address set city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, district = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=INTEGER}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver = #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, city, detail, district, phone, province, receiver, user_id from address
